title: Creamy Chicken and Sweetcorn Chowder
ingredients: ['675g boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces', '80g chopped onion', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '50g butter', '2 cubes chicken stock', '250ml hot water', '3/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '500ml single cream', '225g grated Cheddar cheese', '420g tinned creamed style corn', '1 (130g) tin diced green chillies', '1 dash hot pepper sauce', '1 tomato, chopped', '1/4 bunch fresh coriander sprigs, for garnish']
